title: New IDC COVID-19 Tech Index Points Towards Declines in IT Spending, But Also Pockets of Opportunity for IT Vendors - Associated Press
description: New IDC COVID-19 Tech Index Points Towards Declines in IT Spending, But Also Pockets of Opportunity for IT Vendors Associated Press
content:
FRAMINGHAM, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Apr 15, 2020--
A new index of leading indicators for IT spending launched today by International Data Corporation ( IDC ) supports recent forecasts that point toward declines in overall tech spending in 2020, but also high… [+6318 chars]
